mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userId, email, password, nickname, gender) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT userId FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId} AND email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE userId = #{userId}
